name: Pool
_source: s;Anuki;Looks like Roland really knows how to relax.{w}{br}Morrissey Castle always felt so...{w} functional.{w}{br}I couldn't imagine father installing an elaborate bath like this.
s;Simon;Yeah, this whole place feels like it's suited for luxury, not defense.
s;Simon;Was Roland ever attacked by bandits or groups like the New Dawn?{w}{br}I feel like he wouldn't last long if so.
s;Anuki;Honestly, not that I know of, which kind of surprises me.{w}{br}He's definitely not projecting the same kind of strength as House Morrissey.
s;Simon;Maybe the Fates want him around?

s;Anuki;It's probably more likely that he got lucky.{w}{br}His land falls safely between House Morrissey, Troy, and the outskirts of Vesner's old lands,{w} so there's not a great way for bandits to get to him.
s;Simon;Then I guess he can keep living in luxury until something changes.
